whatIs.title: What Is Search Engine Optimization (SEO)?
descriptionParagraphs: Search Engine Optimization, or SEO, is the practice of improving your website’s visibility in search engine results like Google, Bing, and others.
When done right, SEO helps you appear at the exact moment people are searching for the products or services you offer — without paying for ads.

But SEO is more than keywords and links. It's a long-term digital strategy built on relevance, authority, and user experience. From optimizing website structure and loading speed to creating helpful content and earning backlinks, SEO is the foundation of sustainable online growth.
Whether your goal is to get found locally or rank internationally, SEO is the smartest investment you can make for your brand.

faqs.question: How long does it take to see SEO results ?
faqs.answer: SEO is a long-term investment. Most websites start seeing results in 3–6 months, but timing depends on your competition, website quality, and strategy. At Interacti Marketing Agency, we aim for both short-term gains and long-term growth.

faqs.question: What’s the difference between SEO and paid ads ?
faqs.answer: SEO builds organic traffic over time, offering sustainable results without ongoing ad spend. Paid ads deliver immediate visibility but disappear when you stop paying. The ideal strategy includes both — and we can help you balance them.

faqs.question: Can SEO work for small businesses ?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. In fact, local SEO is one of the most effective tools for small businesses to reach nearby customers and compete with bigger players online.

faqs.question: Is SEO still relevant with AI and ChatGPT taking over search ?

whatIs.title: What Is Local SEO?
descriptionParagraphs: Local SEO (Search Engine Optimization) is the process of optimizing your digital presence so your business appears in local search results ; especially on Google Maps, local packs, and 'near me' searches.
Unlike traditional SEO, Local SEO focuses on location-based signals, such as your Google Business Profile, local backlinks, NAP consistency (Name, Address, Phone), and customer reviews.
Whether you're a dentist in Marseille or a real estate agency in Tunis, Local SEO ensures your business appears when it matters most ; when someone nearby is ready to act.

faqs.question: How is Local SEO different from general SEO?
faqs.answer: Local SEO focuses on geographic-based visibility ; helping businesses show up in Google Maps and 'near me' searches. It emphasizes location signals, reviews, and local relevance, unlike general SEO which targets broader visibility.

faqs.question: Do I need a physical address to benefit from Local SEO?
faqs.answer: Yes, having a physical address is ideal. It allows you to verify a Google Business Profile and appear in local map results. However, service-area businesses can still benefit with proper setup.

faqs.question: Can I rank in multiple cities or regions with Local SEO?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We create geo-targeted landing pages and optimize for each location, allowing you to build presence across several cities ; ideal for franchises and growing businesses.

faqs.question: How do reviews affect Local SEO rankings?
faqs.answer: Reviews are a major ranking factor. High-quality, recent, and relevant reviews boost your credibility and help you rank better in local packs and Maps.

faqs.question: How long does it take to see Local SEO results?
faqs.answer: Results can appear within 1–3 months for less competitive markets. For dense cities or saturated industries, it may take 4–6 months. At Interacti, we aim for early wins + long-term growth.

Because you can't rank high if search engines can't understand your site.

whatIs.title: What Is Technical SEO?
descriptionParagraphs: Technical SEO refers to the process of optimizing your website's technical structure so search engines can crawl, index, and understand your content effectively.
While content and backlinks are important, they won't help much if your website is slow, broken, or unreadable to search engines.

Technical SEO includes everything from improving site speed and mobile usability to fixing crawl errors, securing the site (HTTPS), implementing structured data, and ensuring that your site architecture supports ranking.
It's the invisible engine behind successful SEO ; and it's where serious growth starts.

faqs.question: What's the difference between SEO and technical SEO?
faqs.answer: SEO includes content, links, and optimization. Technical SEO focuses purely on how search engines access and interpret your site ; like speed, structure, and indexability.

faqs.question: How do I know if my website has technical SEO issues?
faqs.answer: If your site is slow, has broken pages, or isn't ranking despite good content ; it likely has technical SEO problems. An audit can confirm this.

faqs.question: Do I need technical SEO if I already have content and backlinks?
faqs.answer: Yes. Without a solid technical foundation, your content and links won't perform to their full potential.

faqs.question: Will technical SEO improvements boost my rankings instantly?
faqs.answer: Some fixes lead to quick wins (like crawl errors), while others build long-term growth (like improving Core Web Vitals). We track both.

faqs.question: Can Interacti work with my development team?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We can either implement fixes ourselves or collaborate with your in-house devs — with detailed documentation and guidance.

whatIs.title: What Is eCommerce SEO?
descriptionParagraphs: eCommerce SEO is the process of optimizing your online store so that your product pages, categories, and brand pages rank higher in search engines like Google.
Unlike traditional SEO, eCommerce SEO focuses on improving visibility across hundreds ; or even thousands ; of product-level pages.
It involves optimizing product titles, meta descriptions, images, technical architecture, filters, internal linking, and user experience ; all with the goal of turning search intent into sales.
The ultimate goal? Getting more qualified traffic to your store without relying solely on paid ads.
It's not just about getting clicks. It's about turning search into conversions.

whatIs.title: What Is Generative Engine Optimization (GEO)?

- ChatGPT browsing + plugins
- Bing Copilot
- Voice and visual search (Gemini, Claude, etc.)
Unlike traditional SEO, which focuses on blue links, GEO is about being cited, referenced, or quoted as a trusted source within the AI-generated answer.

- Semantic clarity
- Source linking and citations
- Brand mentions + expert signals
GEO isn't just about being first ; it's about being selected by machines that summarize the web.

whatIs.title: What Is Digital Marketing?

It includes a mix of strategies and tools like:
• Content creation and SEO
• Social media engagement
• Paid ads (Google, Meta, LinkedIn)

But real digital marketing goes beyond tactics. It’s about creating a connected experience across the customer journey — where every interaction builds trust, moves users closer to action, and delivers value at every step.
When done right, digital marketing isn’t just marketing. It’s momentum.

whatIs.title: What Is Digital Advertising?
descriptionParagraphs: Digital advertising is the process of promoting your business through paid placements across digital platforms — including search engines, social media, display networks, and video platforms.
It enables precise targeting based on location, demographics, interests, behavior, and intent.
There are four major types:
• Search Ads (Google Search): Appear when users search for specific keywords
• Social Ads (Meta, LinkedIn, TikTok): Delivered based on user profile and engagement
• Display Ads: Visual banners shown across websites & apps
• Video Ads: Short-form content placed on YouTube, Instagram Reels, TikTok, etc.
Digital advertising is not about reaching everyone. It's about reaching the *right* people — with trackable ROI.

whatIs.title: What Is UI/UX Design?

- UI (User Interface) shapes the look and feel: buttons, typography, layout, and interaction.
Together, they ensure that your digital product is:
✅ Easy to navigate
✅ Consistent across devices
✅ Clear in its hierarchy
✅ Optimized for conversion
At Interacti Marketing Agency, we design with empathy, test with purpose, and build with intent.
UX is how it works. UI is how it feels. Design is how it *wins*.

whatIs.title: What Is LinkedIn Profile Optimization?
descriptionParagraphs: LinkedIn Profile Optimization is the process of transforming your profile into a compelling, strategic, and searchable digital asset.
It's more than just filling out your profile ; it's about:
• Positioning your expertise clearly and persuasively
• Writing headlines, summaries, and descriptions that attract attention
• Integrating the right keywords to appear in search results
• Using visuals to reflect professionalism and personality
• Encouraging engagement and connection requests
At Interacti Marketing Agency, we help you turn your profile into a conversion-ready presence ; whether your goal is getting hired, building a network, or growing your reputation.
A good profile doesn't just describe you. It opens opportunities.

whatIs.title: What Is Resume Writing?
descriptionParagraphs: Resume writing is the process of crafting a tailored, well-structured, and persuasive document that highlights your qualifications, experience, and potential ; in a way that resonates with recruiters and hiring systems (ATS).
It's not about listing tasks ; it's about presenting:
• Your professional identity and strengths
• Your impact and results, not just responsibilities
• Your career trajectory and goals
• Relevant keywords for each target job
• Clean formatting that's both human- and system-readable
At Interacti Marketing Agency, we turn your experience into a value-driven resume that tells your story and sells your strengths.
A strong resume doesn't get read. It gets shortlisted.

hero.heading: Video Production Services
hero.subheading: Videos That Speak, Sell, and Stick
introParagraphs: In a world where attention is currency, video is your most persuasive asset.
At Interacti Marketing Agency, we blend storytelling, strategy, and cinematic quality to create videos that move people ; and drive results.
From scripting and shooting to editing and publishing, we handle everything with purpose, precision, and a deep understanding of your goals.
Video isn't just content ; it's your brand in motion.

whatIs.title: What Is Video Production?
descriptionParagraphs: Video production is the complete process of planning, creating, editing, and delivering video content designed to communicate, convert, and inspire.
It includes:
• Strategic planning and content goals
• Script writing and creative direction
• Filming and on-location production
• Editing, animation, and post-production
• Publishing and distribution optimization
• Performance tracking and video SEO
At Interacti Marketing Agency, we don't just produce nice videos ; we produce video assets with real business impact.
Because in video, clarity beats complexity ; and story drives results.
